an1.82:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, pamado.
an1.83:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, appamado.
an1.84:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, kosajjam.
an1.85:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, viriyarambho.
an1.86:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, mahicchata.
an1.87:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, appicchata.
an1.88:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, asantutthita.
an1.89:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, santutthita.
an1.90:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikaro.
an1.91:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaro.
an1.92:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, asampajannam.
an1.93:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, sampajannam.
an1.94:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, papamittata.
an1.95:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, kalyanamittata.
an1.96:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, anuyogo akusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo kusalanam dhammanam.
an1.96:1.2: Anuyogo, bhikkhave, akusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo kusalanam dhammanam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.97:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yo evam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, anuyogo kusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo akusalanam dhammanam.
an1.97:1.2: Anuyogo, bhikkhave, kusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo akusalanam dhammanam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
